entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SSW 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
